name: Gregory WILSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Wilson v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Gregory WILSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of November, 2002, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
810 A.2d 113
Gregory WILSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 48 WAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 8, 2002.
